titles.title: Ensuring Quality and Access to Cancer Care Act of 2004
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act adjust the amount of payment under the physician fee schedule for drug administration services furnished to medicare beneficiaries.
Ensuring Quality and Access to Cancer Care Act of 2004

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Ensuring Quality and Access to Cancer Care Act of 2004 - Amends the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003 to increase the applicable percentage for services furnished during 2005 to the applicable percentage currently specified for 2004 with respect to transitional adjustment to the physician fee schedule for drug administration services furnished to Medicare beneficiaries.
